message: حد يعرف إزاي أعرف أو أعمل Export للباسووردات المستجله في الـ Remote Desktop Connection اللي في الويندوز؟ بيقولوا بتكون متسجله في ملف Default.rdp لكن الملف اللي عندي مش متسجل فيه غير رقم IP واحد ومافيش فيه أي باسووردات

data.message: from the previous link: "Remote Desktop Connection Manager also gives you the ability to assign each server a ‘friendly name’, which is local to your machine, so you easily ‘rename’ the servers to what is convenient for you.  Additionally, you have the ability to save the configuration file, so that you can export it to other management machines or save a backup of your customized layout"
Thanks Mohamed I will try it
See if the passwords are in Windows Vault, then you cna easily export them http://www.7tutorials.com/how-backup-and-restore-windows-vault-passwords
